title: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault War Chest
notes: Keyboard & mouse controls. **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**. In desktop mode you will get the intro video, but in Game Mode you need to map buttons to Alt+Enter in order to skip this and get to the game menu.
description: Compilation pack including the Medal of Honor: Allied Assault main game and the Medal of Honor: Allied Assault Spearhead and Medal of Honor: Allied Assault Breakthrough expansion packs.
